CustomField.description: 4/3/12 MS: This field should be completed if the lab requests a replacement. If maternal blood tubes were missing, hemolyzed, or collection was not done according to the instructions in the DCS, "Replacement Requested" should be selected.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field should be completed if the lab requests a replacement maternal blood sample.
CustomField.label: Maternal Blood Redraw
